lead_paragraph: The NBA will begin putting sponsorship logos on player uniforms in 2017-18, a move that could generate at least $100 million annually and a step that the NFL, Major League Baseball and NHL have yet to take.

headline.main: NBA to Begin Selling Jersey Sponsorships in 2017-18
headline.print_headline: NBA to Begin Selling Jersey Sponsorships in 2017-18

snippet: The NBA will begin putting sponsorship logos on player uniforms in 2017-18, a move that could generate at least $100 million annually and a step that the NFL, Major League Baseball and NHL have yet to take....
